introduction.clause_text: This Business Contract is entered into as of [DATE OF CONTRACT] (the “Contract”) between [BUSINESS NAME] (“Business”) and [CLIENT NAME] (“Client”), having an address of [CLIENT ADDRESS] (together, “Parties”).

transaction_details.clause_text: The Business agrees to provide and the Client agrees to retain the Services to be performed by Business in accordance with the terms and conditions of this Contract.

definition_of_services.clause_text: The Business shall provide [DETAILED DESCRIPTION OF SERVICES TO BE PERFORMED].

service_standards.clause_text: The Services provided shall comply with the Business’ standards, quotation and expectations as detailed to Client.

payment_terms.clause_text: Client will pay Business $____ per hour or a $____ per occurrence flat rate for the Services performed.

discount_and_late_payment.clause_text: Business shall provide [no discounts OR a discount if paid within ___ days]. Late payments incur a fee if unpaid within 7 days, and material breach occurs after 10 days.

cancellation.clause_text: Client may cancel this Contract with written notice and payment of a $100.00 cancellation fee plus any incidental costs incurred.

limitation_of_remedies.clause_text: If Business cannot fulfill its obligations due to circumstances beyond its control, Business may provide a replacement or refund the Client in full.

dispute_resolution.clause_text: The Parties agree not to post negative public information without prior written notice and an opportunity to resolve disputes amicably.

severability.clause_text: If any provision is found invalid or unenforceable, the remainder of the Agreement remains in full force and effect.

waiver.clause_text: Failure to enforce any right shall not constitute a waiver of future enforcement.

legal_fees.clause_text: The prevailing party in any legal action shall be entitled to recover legal and attorney’s fees.

governing_law_and_jurisdiction.clause_text: This Agreement shall be governed by the law of the State or Country where the Parties do business, or [STATE] law if different.

entire_agreement.clause_text: This Agreement constitutes the entire agreement between the Parties and may only be modified in writing signed by both Parties.

signatures.clause_text: The Parties agree to the terms of this Agreement as evidenced by their signatures.
